Method Detail

Factory

public static ComposerProcessing Factory(ConfigInterface $objConfig, $objJob=null, $objLog=null)

Creates an content Composer using the TypoScript style setup as parameter
Example:

10 = \Cmp3\Composer\PdfShrink 10.quality = ebook 20 = \Cmp3\Composer\PdfOverlay 20.background = EXT:mypproject/stylesheets/nice-bg.pdf 20.multi = 1 30 = \Cmp3\Composer\PdfImpose 30.plan = EXT:mypproject/stylesheets/make_double_page_lua.plan 30.lua = 1

Parameters

$objJob -
$objLog -
